# Passing Python Variable to R

Here we define a variable in Python and use it in R.

```{r}
library(reticulate)
```

## Python

```{python}
my_value = 100
```

## R (access Python variable)

```{r}
py_my_value <- py$my_value
cat("Value from Python in R:", py_my_value, "\n")
```
